snippet: One reader is glad he “is not a puppet of the establishment.” Another says, “Mr. Trump’s say-anything-anytime habit will backfire on foreign leaders.”...
lead_paragraph: One reader is glad he “is not a puppet of the establishment.” Another says, “Mr. Trump’s say-anything-anytime habit will backfire on foreign leaders.”

headline.print_headline: Why Donald Trump Is/Is Not Suited to Be President
headline.main: Why Donald Trump Is/Is Not Suited to Be President
